full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Contract Title

**Eng** : Dynamics 365 Professional Services Omnibus
**Fran** : Contrat global de services professionnels en Dynamics 365

### Reference Number
PW-22-01004369

### Tender Overview

Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) of the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) with GSIN: D302A P.9.

### Tender Details

*   Solicitation Number: 20220218
*   Publication Date: 2022-08-15
*   Closing Date: 2022-09-21T14:00:00
*   Amended Date: 2022-08-26
*   Tender Status: Expiré (Expired)

### Scope of Work

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) requires the provision of imformation technology (IT) professional services on an “as and when requested” basis to deliver IT expertise in support of OSFI applications over the next two to three fiscal years.

### Security Requirements

*   A minimum corporate security requirement is Designated Organization Screening (DOS).
*   A minimum resource security requirement is Reliability Status.
*   The Common PS SRCL #19 applies.

### Notice and Inquiry

*   Requests for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority named above.
*   Bidders are advised that “buyandsell.gc.ca” is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.
*   Notes may be submitted in either official language. See the official Business and Supply Chain policy on websites availablewith Canada and Quebec trade commitments.

### Bidding and Offer Process

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) will consider bids from qualified and eligible contractors following the tender terms.
